verses.text_plain: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.
verses.verse_html:
1Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation. ▼
▼ Truly: or, Only
 , ▼
▼ waiteth: Heb. is silent

footnotes.body_html: ▼ waiteth: Heb. is silent

verses.text_plain: He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.
verses.verse_html:
2He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved. ▼
▼ defence: Heb. high place

footnotes.body_html: ▼ defence: Heb. high place

verses.text_plain: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.
verses.verse_html: 3How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.

tokens.text: How long will ye imagine mischief
all of you: as a bowing

verses.text_plain: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.
verses.verse_html:
4They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah. ▼
▼ inwardly: Heb. in their inward parts

footnotes.body_text: ▼ inwardly: Heb. in their inward parts
footnotes.body_html: ▼ inwardly: Heb. in their inward parts

verses.text_plain: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
verses.verse_html: 5My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

verses.text_plain: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.
verses.verse_html: 6He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.

verses.text_plain: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.
verses.verse_html: 7In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.

verses.text_plain: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 8Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

verses.text_plain: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.
verses.verse_html:
9Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity. ▼
▼ altogether: or, alike

verses.text_plain: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.
verses.verse_html: 10Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.

verses.text_plain: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.
verses.verse_html:
11God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God. ▼
▼ power: or, strength

verses.text_plain: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
verses.verse_html: 12Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
